memberdef.name: DEFAULT_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(FG_R, FG_G, FG_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: INVERTED_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(BG_R, BG_G, BG_B, FG_R, FG_G, FG_B)

memberdef.name: RED_TEXT_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(RED_R, RED_G, RED_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: WALL_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(BLUE_R, BLUE_G, BLUE_B, BROWN_R, BROWN_G, BROWN_B)

memberdef.name: EXIT_DOOR_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(YELLOW_R, YELLOW_G, YELLOW_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: KEY_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(YELLOW_R, YELLOW_G, YELLOW_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: GOBLIN_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(RED_R, RED_G, RED_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: HIDDEN_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(GREY_R, GREY_G, GREY_B, GREY_R, GREY_G, GREY_B)

memberdef.name: START_DOOR_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(GREEN_R, GREEN_G, GREEN_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: FLOOR_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(BG_R, BG_G, BG_B, BG_R, BG_G, BG_B)

memberdef.name: LIFE_FOUNTAIN_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(BG_R, BG_G, BG_B, GREEN_R, GREEN_G, GREEN_B)

memberdef.name: MANA_FOUNTAIN_COLORS
memberdef.initializer: NCCHANNELS_INITIALIZER(BG_R, BG_G, BG_B, BLUE_R, BLUE_G, BLUE_B)

detaileddescription.para: This constant is used to indicate a successful operation in various functions throughout the application.

memberdef.name: NULL_PTR_HANDLER_RETURN
memberdef.initializer: if (ptr == NULL) { \ log_msg(ERROR, modul, format, ##__VA_ARGS__); \ return return_value; \ }

memberdef.name: CHECK_ARG_RETURN
memberdef.initializer: if (bool_expr) { \ log_msg(ERROR, modul, format, ##__VA_ARGS__); \ return return_value; \ }

briefdescription.para: String struct with a fixed maximum length, it is directly linked to the macro MAX_STRING_LENGTH.
Global memory pool for the application.

detaileddescription.para: This variable holds the main memory pool used for dynamic memory allocation throughout the application. It is initialized during the application's startup and should be properly managed to avoid memory leaks.

briefdescription.para: Defines common macros, types, and global variables for color schemes and utilities.
